PostToolUse.name: Continuous Audio Pattern Guard
PostToolUse.description: Warn if Audio component is placed inside a Sequence (causes cutting)

hooks.message: WARNING: <Audio> should be at the ROOT level, not inside <Sequence>! Audio inside Sequence will CUT between slides. Move <Audio> to the outermost <AbsoluteFill>.

hooks.message: Voice generated! Measure duration: python scripts/measure_audio.py [output.mp3] --fps 30
